code: @Override protected JndiRegistry createRegistry() throws Exception {     JndiRegistry jndi = super.createRegistry().     jndi.bind("foo", new MyFooBean()).     return jndi. }
@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:a").routeId("a").bean("foo", "hello").to("mock:a").     from("direct:b").routeId("b").bean("foo", "bye").to("mock:b"). }

@Test public void testBeanRefMethodNotFound() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:a").routeId("a").bean("foo", "hello").to("mock:a").             from("direct:b").routeId("b").bean("foo", "bye").to("mock:b").         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (FailedToCreateRouteException e) {         assertEquals("b", e.getRouteId()).         MethodNotFoundException cause = assertIsInstanceOf(MethodNotFoundException.class, e.getCause().getCause()).         assertEquals("bye", cause.getMethodName()).     } }
